item.title: A message from Ken Livingstone
item.description: Shoring up the core vote, Ken Livingstone writes to Labour party voters/members in Brent Central. “We can’t afford to have the country run like Brent Council.” Letter received in Mapesbury, 2nd May. Uploaded to TheStraightChoice.
